# IP-Obfuscation - Generate obscure forms of IP address

Script is written according to `inet_aton()` introduced by `4.2BSD` ,which is undesirable and considered as non-standard but de facto quite widely interoperable.

IP addresses generated by this script look obscure but work well, which may help a lot in some conditions ([here is one](https://findneo.github.io/2017/11/HITCON-CTF-2017-Babyfirst-Revenge-series-writeup/),for example).And so many forms to be chosen from is quite cool.

You can check [this article](https://findneo.github.io/2017/11/textual-representation-of-IP-address/) for more detail.

# Example
```python
python obscureIP.py
```
output:
```python
[0]	0x00000000c0.0x000a8.0x42.0x0000000e9
```
